name: ATEEZ
description: ATEEZ is known for their powerful performances, pirate-themed storylines, and explosive stage presence that has earned them a massive global following.

funFacts: Writes and produces many ATEEZ songs
Known for his unique fashion sense and DIY styling
Compared to G-Dragon for his artistry
Very short but has huge stage presence
His leadership style is warm and supportive
members.bio: Hongjoong is ATEEZ's captain and creative leader who writes and produces their music. Despite his small stature, his stage presence is immense. His unique fashion and artistic vision have made him ATEEZ's icon.

funFacts: Known for being extremely clean and organized
His stage name was almost 'Mars'
Has stunning visuals that went viral
Very gentle and caring personality
Takes care of the dorm cleanliness
members.bio: Seonghwa is ATEEZ's visual known for his stunning looks and neat personality. He's famous for keeping everything clean and organized. His elegant visuals and gentle care for members have made him beloved.

funFacts: One of the tallest K-Pop idols at 184cm
Known for his golden retriever personality
Extremely energetic and positive
His dancing is powerful yet precise
Always smiling and making others happy
members.bio: Yunho is ATEEZ's main dancer and the group's 'golden retriever.' His tall frame and powerful dancing are impressive. His constantly positive energy and bright personality light up every room.

funFacts: Known for his unique birthmark near his eye
Very quiet and introverted
His visuals are often called 'prince-like'
Was a Big Hit trainee before joining KQ
His smile transformation is iconic
members.bio: Yeosang is ATEEZ's prince-like visual with a distinctive birthmark near his eye. Despite being quiet, his stunning visuals speak volumes. His transformation from resting face to smile is legendary among fans.

funFacts: Known for his intense stage presence and expressions
Transforms completely on stage - called 'demon'
Very soft and affectionate off-stage
His fancams consistently go viral
Has a famous friendship with Wooyoung (Woosan)
members.bio: San is ATEEZ's center known for his legendary stage presence. He transforms into a 'demon' on stage with intense expressions, yet is incredibly soft off-stage. His fancams regularly go viral for his charisma.

funFacts: Known for his extremely deep voice
Second tallest member at 183cm
Took a mental health hiatus and returned stronger
His rap delivery is explosive
Very goofy and playful personality
members.bio: Mingi is ATEEZ's main rapper with an incredibly deep voice. His powerful rap and tall presence command attention. After taking a health break, he returned stronger, showing resilience and strength.

funFacts: Known for his sharp, precise dancing
Famous friendship with San (Woosan)
Very playful and mischievous
His expressions during performances are iconic
Close friends with BTS's Jimin and Kang Daniel
members.bio: Wooyoung is ATEEZ's main dancer known for his sharp movements and expressions. His friendship with San ('Woosan') is beloved. His playful personality and connections with other idols make him a social butterfly.

funFacts: Famous for crushing apples with his bare hands
Known for his incredibly powerful vocals
Can hit high notes while doing intense choreo
Very strong physically despite being maknae
His live vocals are always stable and powerful
members.bio: Jongho is ATEEZ's maknae with one of the most powerful voices in K-Pop. He's famous for crushing apples with bare hands. His ability to hit high notes while dancing is unmatched.

seo.title: ATEEZ Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with ATINY
seo.description: Create your ATEEZ name with Hongjoong, Seonghwa, San, Wooyoung, Jongho & more! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean names. Perfect for ATINY.
